title: I LEVELED UP BUT DIDN'T GET A CHAMPION CAPSULE [Season 8]

replies.body: Look like you did get that chest already and opened it for and Olaf and Singed shard. Must have just taken a min or two to come through is all ^_^

I did open one, but it was actually an honor capsule(when you enter.. it says, "here's something to blah blah"), not a champion capsule. This may have been the glitch. The launcher may have thought that i opened a champion capsule instead of an honor one, so it didn't give me anything. I leveled up later that day by playing a few more games. Thank you for trying to help me with this. I need right about 150-160 BE to get a 4800 champ, so receiving the champion capsule is very important for me.
I did open one, but it was actually an honor capsule, not a champion capsule. I leveled up later by playing a few more games. Thank you.
